title: Mahi Mahi with Mango Salsa Recipe
full_text:
Mahi Mahi with Mango Salsa Recipe
Close
Jump to recipe
Prep
5 mins
Cook
20 mins
Active
25 mins
Total
25 mins
Serves
4 servings
Cook Mode
(Keep screen awake)
Ingredients
For the Salsa:
2 1/2
cups
chopped, peeled mango
1
cup
diced
red onion
1
jalapeño
, finely diced
1
teaspoon
lime zest
3
tablespoons
lime juice
1 1/4
cups chopped
red bell pepper
1/4
cup
chopped cilantro
For the Mahi Mahi:
2
pounds
mahi mahi
1
tablespoon
olive oil
Salt
and
pepper
Directions
In a medium bowl, combine ingredients for salsa. Mix well and set aside.
Heat a ridged grill pan over medium high heat. Rub fish with olive oil and season with salt and pepper. Grill until opaque and cooked through, about five minutes per side. Top with salsa.
